website_summaries.verdict: If you are active, you may want to go for a less restrictive brace that won't make your knee as sweaty.
pros: Very comfortable and offers almost unrestricted movement
cons: Closed design can make it uncomfortably hot to wear in warmer weather

customer_reviews.title: Beware-not eligible for returns if does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Beware this is not eligible for return if it doesn't fit. Wasted $70. Although measurementioned says around knee it really is the thigh measurement. Bad sizing! Will
customer_reviews.author: C. Paschall

customer_reviews.title: CHART SIZE IS NOT THE RIGHT ONE FOR THIS BRACE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st Knee brace I purchased. I was impressed by the quality of brace. I have a measurement of 16"+. I purchased this brace as a LARGE according to the chart Amazon has provided . Turns out, the chart Amazon is using for this model is not the right one. PLEASE SEE THE PIC OF CHART THAT IS ACTUALLY ON PACKAGING. Brace fit too perfect and hard to get off. Returning brace for XL. I will give 5 stars once i get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Ramirez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not a deal breaker for how good this is but something to keep in mind
customer_reviews.text: Very supportive! I was unable to play racquetball for over a week so I got this to help and it certainly did! If you are having issues with lots of lateral movement (like tennis/racquetball, basketball, etc) this will be very helpful. Only thing is that I was on the line between medium and small. I went with the medium based on reviews. However, after 2 weeks, the brace stretched out a bit and is now big. I have to tighten it a few times per game. Not a deal breaker for how good this is but something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mandijane8

customer_reviews.title: Cannot imagine any other knee brace providing more support in a comfortable fashion
customer_reviews.text: At 75 I am still working on the four acres of land our home sits on. As the years passed, my knees started to show the wear and tear of years of hard work. I ordered this knee brace, and find it to be incredible. In fact I ordered another one, so I have support for both knees. I must admit that before putting on my pants I look as thought I am "bionic", but the support the brace provides has given me a new lease on the farm. These are rather expensive, but you get what you pay for and this knee brace is worth every penny spent!
customer_reviews.author: J Skydell

customer_reviews.title: amazing support.
customer_reviews.text: amazing support.. Im a big guy ( 6FT talk weight in 320lbs) and I tore a meniscus on my right knee; over xmas ... With this I am able to walk with confidence and slowly heal... It fits alittle on the small size XX Large but its definitely stable. Definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Stable Knee, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: This brace is perfect for me. I have very large circumference legs, but the measuring instructions made the fit a no-brainer. I can comfortably wear this for up to eight hours at a time, because I adjust the straps to maintain tight compression.. but this brace adds the stability I need to function. Warmer temps might be a challenge, since the body of the brace retains heat; I'll take the trade-off, because the warmth also eases any muscle tension or soreness in the knee.
customer_reviews.author: l.b.

customer_reviews.title: Reservations About This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'd be very cautious about ordering if your measurements are borderline. My kneecap measured 15" so I could have gone with Medium or Large. Based on others' reviews, I went with the larger size but not happy with the fit. It fits my actual knee well but a bit too big on the thigh and calf so it feels loose overall. Also, I have an MCL injury and this brace presses in a little too hard on it making painful even when at rest.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Meyers

customer_reviews.title: superior support with lots of comfort
customer_reviews.text: very much like the cross over tabs. Hinges are removable for washing, but a a bit difficult to get them back in. Trial and error works till you find a method that stretches the retaining pocket and doesnt tear the hinge pockets. Wear this daily. Ordered another one so I can rotate them out. Top of the line product, priced higher than the other McDavid models but in my opinion, its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: WmGoatHuntleyIL

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product is great and I'm generally happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is great and I'm generally happy with it, it has some disadvantage like size measure is not correct and I suggest if you are within the limit buy the bigger one instead of what you think is actual one, other thing that annoying is the fully covered back of the knee, I prefer it with empty space to give you more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: mohammad ebrahim pouyanfar

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up or be sorry
customer_reviews.text: Measured my knee, bought the large size based on the size chart (I was in the middle of the measurement range for L). Had difficulty putting it on, but wore it for a whole day anyway, figuring it would either loosen up or I'd get used to it. The stability was good, but after a whole day (at work, so I couldn't take it off), I ended up with raw skin and blisters at the pressure points. The design is good, however (I'm an orthopedic NP, so I know braces), so I'm buying myself the next size up (XL).
customer_reviews.author: Duxall Inarow

customer_reviews.title: Tight to get on and off, but that's expected
customer_reviews.text: It's always a though balance with knee braces - you want them to be tight enough to actually hold your bits in place and provide stability, but you also don't want to sweat while taking them off. This brace is a little tougher to take off and put on than I'd like, but once it's on, it's surprisingly comfortable. I have very large calves and quads, so finding something I can get on that also doesn't chafe at the top or bottom where the knee-hole stays in place can be tough. This is a solid brace, and my meniscus is happier for it.
customer_reviews.author: snipeTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight.  Buy one size up!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend you buy one size up. My size was the bottom number for my size. 15 inches. That size said I wore a large. Once it arrived it was ridiculously tight. There is no way someone slightly larger than me would be able to fit this. As far as material and quality. It feels and performs extremely well. As good as my DonJoy and only 1/3 the size. I will update with a more complete review after I have worn it for a significant amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and effective, runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this size because I measured my leg first. It runs a bit small as it was hard to get on at first. Now that it has broken in a little I'm glad I got the smaller one, but it does hug a little tighter than I'd like it. Unfortunately that's the only way a brace will stay in the right position for a body type like mine. (Thick soccer player legs!) This brace is hardcore sturdy though. Really nice support. Just wish the sizing was a little more precise.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: tricky knee
customer_reviews.text: I have a knee that three doctors told me I would be using a cane or wheel chair. I used their braces wrap around neoprene with metal hinges. McDavid runs rings around them in comfort and support. Just measure your knee it does slide on and you wrap it feels good and I have had my knee wobble but it hold s together with Mc David. Highly recommend this brace.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the "custom fit" brace my doctor prescribed.
customer_reviews.text: My Doc had a person come to my house and measure me for a custom knee brace. It kept falling off and sliding down to about my ankle. No amount of adjusting fixed the problem. I tried a few, "over the counter" braces before I came upon the 429x. The 429x fits snugly, stabilizes my knee and gives me confidence that my knee is not going to collapse when I need it most. I highly recommend it. I would suggest and under sleeve for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: M. Umberger

customer_reviews.title: Rigid but stable
customer_reviews.text: This brace is very rigid and provides great support but a little too much if you’re looking for fluent gait pattern. I wore it after my ACL reconstruction to provide necessary stability without the long leg brace I had immediately after surgery. At first it was nice but the hinges need to be a little looser. No way you can have a good walking pattern with that much rigidity. I did wear during my initial ACL complete tear and waiting on surgery and it definitely stopped Knee from buckling .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brace for post-MCL surgery
customer_reviews.text: I had MCL surgery on my left knee and just didn't find the brace that the hospital gave me comfortable. I decided to order one off of Amazon on a whim and found that it was great for my knee! Supportive yet breathable and easy to take on/off. I loved it so much, I decided to order another one for my mother who has also had MCL surgery multiple times and needless to say, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: RVS

customer_reviews.title: ... the one covered by his insurance just wasn't that good. He had suggested a different brace but when ...
customer_reviews.text: My son hurt his knee at work and his chiropractor told him to order a brace online as the one covered by his insurance just wasn't that good. He had suggested a different brace but when he saw my son with this brace he said this will be the one he will recommend from now on. My son says the brace helps a lot so he doesn't worry as much about the knee. He will be having surgery on the knee and the surgeon was impressed by the brace.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Decent brace.
customer_reviews.text: This brace effectively stabilizes a knee with some minor ligament damage. I like that it's easy to remove the hinges for washing. However, I'm not sure I'll order again because the velcro straps delaminated on both of the ones I have after a maybe a dozen or so washings, and these get very sweaty and have to be washed frequently or they get very smelly. This is enough of a nuisance that I only think this brace is OK and probably wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee_ATL

customer_reviews.title: firm support of good quality material
customer_reviews.text: I love the firm support the McDavid brace provides. It does run hot and not good for longer than 2 hours at a time because of circulation and swelling of the calf, that comes with any one piece elastic brace. For short duration's, like mowing the front yard or exercising, it is great. Love this brace. I like it better than my Shock Doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Chutes

customer_reviews.title: This is the brace to buy FIRST
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return this item, because I thought it was too tight. After 3 other knee braces, I was pretty disgusted. But I waited until the inflammation went down and tried again. I can get up from a chair and walk without holding on to furniture. The support is amazing!! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Craig

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Brace
customer_reviews.text: I am waiting to get my left knee replaced.. So difficult to walk around, as I am a busy body always doing something. I know I needed a strong brace as I was a weight lifter for years and am around 290lbs. I found this brace, purchased and have been wearing around on days I know I will be on my feet a lot or hiking or physical activity. Yes, hiking... If not for this brace I could not go hiking with my sons.. Still limp and have pain, but this brace stays in place and helps me still be active with a knee that is all but about shot... I am grateful I found this brace!
customer_reviews.author: Mike klinkowski

customer_reviews.title: It is the right size for my knee and fits like its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Shipping speed was lightning fast and the item was well packaged. Only issue with the brace that I have is its comfort with the metal hinge inserted. It is the right size for my knee and fits like its supposed to, its just not comfortable and seems to cause more irritation than ease. I took the hinge out and just wore the brace which seemed to provide adequate support for my knee and was no longer uncomfortable to wear. Without the hinge, I would say the brace itself does provide an adequate amount of support. Overall, I am not too satisfied with the brace but was very satisfied with the ordering process and how fast the item arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Blair

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for a couple months now. I bought to take to the gym as I suffered a knee injury about a year ago. It doesn’t really keep in place very well and keeps sliding down. The velcro straps that are supposed to wrap around the knee doesn’t really do much .... it could have done with a more velcro. Not a bad a brace but was expecting a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Heron

customer_reviews.title: My knee measured at 19 inches at the widest part per the product guidelines so I ordered an XL (up to 20 inches) as recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This brace definitely helped stabilize my knee, which sped up healing and reduced my discomfort significantly. My knee measured at 19 inches at the widest part per the product guidelines so I ordered an XL (up to 20 inches) as recommended. The brace was very snug, so wasn't comfortable for extended periods (which aren't recommended anyways). If I had a need to order again, I would order the XXL. I would definitely recommend ordering the next size up if your knee measures at the higher end of the measurement recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best universal knee brace
customer_reviews.text: I will forever buy this type of McDavid knee brace. It has worked extremely well for me after my custom knee brace broke, and at a price waaayyy cheaper than a custom. Excellent price and support, does not slide.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Solid brace but a bit too much
customer_reviews.text: Overall I recommend this brace for anyone with knee problems where stability is needed. Its mostly comfortable but does tend to bunch up a bit in the back behind the knee but that is the only issue...perhaps a bit of a redesign with a hollow back. The metal braces give plenty of support to the knee as it bends while walking/running/biking and keeps the knee in line.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Very Stable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the stability it gave; however, it is cumbersome to put on and off. Also can't wear it outside in very warm climate or knee area will roast. It does provide some pain relief but was expecting more!! Can move knee back & forth, a plus when walking.
customer_reviews.author: j. wells

customer_reviews.title: The cross straps above and below the knee and the horizontal straps at top and bottom can be cinched in a great deal if you lose
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering, I called the manufacturer to check on ordering size. They confirmed that this knee brace does run small. If you are between sizes, or suffer occasional swelling, order the next size up. The cross straps above and below the knee and the horizontal straps at top and bottom can be cinched in a great deal if you lose weight from dieting. I highly recommend this knee brace as it has given me instant support and relief, the construction is quality, and the price is very reasonable. My only complaint, which keeps me from giving five stars, is that it's slightly difficult to take off. I cannot emphasize enough that it is important to order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: savvy cat

customer_reviews.title: It's better than the previous one I had which was only ...
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with my left knee while skiing. This strengthens the joint and has helped me to ski without pain. It's better than the previous one I had which was only neoprene but without the side linkages. My only complaint is that there are no loops on the bottom to help pull the brace off. The finger pull loops on the top do help a lot in putting the brace on.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Sport Bamd Review
customer_reviews.text: The knee brace is of excellent quality. It slides on effortlessly, but is woefully difficult to remove, to the point that eventually I feel I'll tear or otherwise break the integrity of the brace.
customer_reviews.author: Old Town Resident

customer_reviews.title: new knee
customer_reviews.text: provided superb support for the basketball athlete I purchased this for. no complaints all season! the size I ordered as per sizing instructions on mfg web page did fit a bit on the snug side but worked well nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: TheWayItIs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent super supportive knee brace with acurate sizing as directed
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic brace; I can walk now! I blew out my knee in a riding accident, immediately ordered this brace. I measured my knee as instructed and the fiitment is just right. This brace is highly supportive almost as good as a cast. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Hanky

customer_reviews.title: Great Brace, Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Order up! According to chart, I’m in the middle of Large. Extra Large barely fits. It really gives wonderful support and is comfortable once you get the right size. 06/13/18 update: ALLERGIES? Careful! I don’t have allergies, but still had reaction - rash under brace - cotton stockinette helped.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Barker

customer_reviews.title: As good or better than the prescription fitted brace my MD ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through several knee braces trying to find just the right support. I believe this is the one. It's easy to get on and off and the crossover velcro firms up the support nicely. It's tight and firm while not being too restrictive. I have a pile of braces that just didn't do the job. This one is as good as, or better than, the one the doctor prescribed. So far, I love this one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Umberger

customer_reviews.title: Overall rating is that this is a good product. However
customer_reviews.text: Overall rating is that this is a good product. However, the upper and lower tabs do not stay glued together after the first washing. I am still looking for a glue that will hold the tabs together and not fail after being washed. The plastic hinges are not durable enough. The would be better off made with aluminum or stainless steel. They tend to break when tightening too much.
customer_reviews.author: James and Linda Wichman

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful knee brace fit is snug but good with measurements.
customer_reviews.text: Really helpful knee brace fit is snug but good with measurements. I feel this brace provides a lot of stability I like the cross stabilization straps as well as the straps around tightness I do feel it slides down my knee throughout the day but does have anchor Holds to pull up.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size-too tight
customer_reviews.text: It seems very promising for a knee luxation, However ,after greatly struggling to put this on, it seemed to offer great support. However the constriction of the leg proved painful after a while. I should have listened to many others who advised to go a size larger than recommended. I will be ordering a larger size---Hopefully the company will see fit to review their sizing instructions.
customer_reviews.author: gear man

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a non custom brace.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the trick. Ordered the size so it would be hard to slide on. It will stretch a bit over time and use. Then with the straps, I can make it real tight and supportive . Hope the velcro lasts long.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, won’t stay in place, and they don’t offer returns
customer_reviews.text: This knee brace is extremely uncomfortable, doesn’t fit right according to the descriptions on their website, and constantly slides down. I tried to return it and they do not offer returns for this item. There are plenty of other options, do not choose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Something maybe allergic to. Or irritating the skin.
customer_reviews.text: Brace is nice but can't wear it. Every time i try to wear the whole era breaks out and requires antibiotics to heal. This has happern twiced. I finally gave up and put it away. Went back to my old warren out brace.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, and extremely supportive.
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely bad knees, and have a hard time finding braces/supports that fit AND work properly. This one does. Great lateral stability, as well as easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: I have been very pleased with my McDavid 429X the only reason i did ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with my McDavid 429X the only reason i did not give it a 5 is because it left red marks on the inside of the knee. Please order a sock liner, that well take care of the red marks on the inside of the knee. the support is very good with lots of lateral and forward and rearward motion stability. this is a very good brace for the money, you well not be disappointed. I ordered one size bigger, tp prevent being to tight. Its better to be a little louse vs to tight, the straps should take care of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made and definitely worth the money. There are straps on the inside to make the fit more comfortable, so make to check and make adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Their size chart is off.
customer_reviews.text: If you are just inside of the upper limit on their size chart... for example 16.75 inch and the upper limit is 17 for a size... get the next size up. Other than having to send the first size back... this thing is pretty nice. 3 times the price of ace... but it wears good when you get one that fits correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff Junky

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: sooooo much better than any brand I've tried before. Held up great through trekking mountains
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: 429X great brace
customer_reviews.text: I have used the 429 for about 2 years and they worked well but I am very impressed with the extra support and stability the X cross straps added. I wear one on each knee and do a 5 miles elliptical 6 days a week. I swear by these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit my chunky thigh with skinny calf. My problem, not theirs.
customer_reviews.author: puppitypup

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think it’s a great product. I got mine a little big because I swell a lot during the day and some days it’s too small. Just keep that in mind when buying it. Which is no fault of the product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfdarlin

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I received the model 422 instead of the M429X, while the name of the item in the title clearly said "M429X". The brace did not come with cross straps, as had been indicated in the title, photo, and description. Luckily, there was a return and refund option. As a side note of advice, it might be useful to purchase a size bigger compared to what's indicated in the table.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wang Zhao

customer_reviews.title: This Knee brace is a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: This Knee Brace is excellent. My knee measures 15.5 inches around. I order LARGE and it is a perfect, snug fit. Straps are stretchy, allowing the user to add varying amounts of tension to improve knee stability. I do not pull straps too tight, as I wear it most of the day with NO discomfort, pinching or circulation problems. Highly recommend McDavid Hinged 429X.
customer_reviews.author: Danny R. McKee

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee Brace
customer_reviews.text: This brace is well designed and comfortable. It provides excellent support and fits like a glove, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Zirkle

customer_reviews.title: Great brace
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best knee brace I’ve owned, I wear for 12-16 hours a day, with no issues
customer_reviews.author: dale r. miller sr.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last enough
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of use. Always order for a size bigger, I got a XL taking the measures like explained but it didn’t fit right, was too tight but still managed to wear it. But after 2 months of normal use, it started to rip apart. Will get another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Mejicanos

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable of the braces i've tried!
customer_reviews.text: This brace gives great support while feeling good. I can get a lot of walking in when I wear this. The McDavid is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Judee

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, the sizing guide was not particularly helpful. ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the sizing guide was not particularly helpful. Followed it exactly and barely got the brace over my knee. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good knee brace
customer_reviews.text: Good knee brace, just did not fit right even though my knee measurements matched up with size chart. I would recommend going to a store and trying it on first to get the correct size, because you cannot return this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Will

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Going by measuring knee I picked the bigger one just to make sure and was still to small and now I’m being told it’s non returnable
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This brace is the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried dozens of braces, this is the one for me. Easy to put on, great stability and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is not good
customer_reviews.text: Brace is fine but size chart inaccurate. Had to return and buy a bigger one
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Pallotta

customer_reviews.title: Better than the doc's
customer_reviews.text: Better than what the doc gave us. Open over kneecap AND the back of the knee, which is nice, because doesnt wrinkle and hurt, and its cooler. Good support.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C.

customer_reviews.title: Stabilizes knee very well -- much better than without metal inserts and cross-straps.  Doesn't slip down after long use.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my injured knee. A bit overkill for my injury and makes my knee sweaty, but works much better to stabilize than other braces that don't have the metal side inserts and it doesn't slip after hours of wear, unlike anything else I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support your knees and they will support you!!
customer_reviews.text: I see a big difference after my work outs after using this brace.... I use it to add support to my left knee replacement so I can add a little more weight on various lifts.... Use common sense no squats or deadlifts if knees are real bad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed K.

customer_reviews.title: Not for small children!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my two year old daughter, as she was experiencing some knee pains, and it did not -I REPEAT- did not fit at all. I am so upset with this purchase. It was a waste of time and money. Hindered more than helped. She was tripping everywhere. Even fell down the stairs and broke her arm. Didn't even work as an arm brace.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keister

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Brace sticks to skin when sweaty, remedy with a good sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: McDavid 429X Hinged Knee Brace
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good, sturdy, supportive, easy to use knee brace. Great brace for those of us with weak knees especially with lateral motion. Is not terribly movement restrictive for the support it gives. I have worn it every shift (construction worker) for the past couple of months, and due to the brace support, my strained knee has been able to heal, w/o missing any work.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Great brace
customer_reviews.text: Have had an unidentifiable knee problem for 8 months. Went to and from different doctors and kept switching braces. Finally they told me to get a hinged brace and after some research I picked this up. Not disappointed. Hinges aren't stiff and the brace itself is comfortable. It can be washed (i recommend delicate and hot setting) and dried. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Needs a sizing update.
customer_reviews.text: OK above the knee but the metal side hinges dig into my calf.
customer_reviews.author: Allen B.

customer_reviews.title: Brace yourselves...
customer_reviews.text: Nice brace. Extremely difficult to put on. Upon standing up or would not stay in place even though it felt snug when sitting down. Not the right brace for me but definitely a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: L-Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Like the brace, but runs small.
customer_reviews.text: It runs SMALL. I measured exactly how the website said, and I was actually on the bottom end of XL (17") and it was FAR to small. to fit comfortably on my thigh. I would get the next size up to be on the safe side! I send it back and got a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Steele

customer_reviews.title: Not for short people
customer_reviews.text: This is not for short people and it is extremely hot
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Good support for my knee with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Good support for my knee with arthritis, good regulation, this support permits me to play tennis in spite of my arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Guarini

customer_reviews.title: Best knee brace ever!
customer_reviews.text: Have about 8 different braces for knee after failed not fixable knee surgery. Best I have used. This is much better than the one they wanted over $1000 for at the Braces & Prosthetics store.
customer_reviews.author: CDN

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size list. Look at my picture before ordering
customer_reviews.text: While the brace I'm sure is great, they have the wrong size list up here. Now I have to get a refund and purchase it all over again. Up date the size codes!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Brace gives great support. I purchased a large which seems like the right size. Only drawback is the indentation it makes on my skin after wearing for a while. Great support though
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: hot and not very comfortable. priced right
customer_reviews.text: Size runs small, for me it's about a 20% help. hard to put on and off.Bulky, hot and not very comfortable. priced right.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: This brace was returned. The brace did not fit ...
customer_reviews.text: This brace was returned. The brace did not fit well, it was uncomfortable and I feel it did not help my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Whiplash

customer_reviews.title: usable
customer_reviews.text: The brace worked well but it rubbed the sides of his knee badly and we had to put some foam in it to prevent a laceration on the skin. Once we did that it provided great support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially for us, short stocky and overweight folks with poor circulation and a bakers cyst
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: ... and on McDavid's website but the brace was not comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I followed the sizing chart on Amazon and on McDavid's website but the brace was not comfortable to wear. The top and bottom of the hinged splints dug into my leg, especially when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Cheese McPants

customer_reviews.title: Great brace
customer_reviews.text: This brace is awesome, I say that because it actually prevented me from blowing out my knee durning a softball game, so I highly recommend this brace for anyone with weak knees or to prevent an old injury to repeat itself. Also the ligament straps feel great, nice and stable extra support.
customer_reviews.author: Amateur-Angler

customer_reviews.title: my knee problem made it painful to pull it up over my knee
customer_reviews.text: I think it helped support my knee, especially lateral movement. The only drawback I found was that the brace was closed, and had to be pulled up over my foot; my knee problem made it painful to pull it up over my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gent

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for wearing all day
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve type is very comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Watch out...
customer_reviews.text: The fitting instructions were detailed, and though followed absolutely by me, resulted in a too small, uncomfortable device.
customer_reviews.author: Ira M. Barocas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect material composition
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to pick the right size. Other than that, this is an amazing brace! I like this more than my $500 don joy brace.
customer_reviews.author: uzair

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good protection.
customer_reviews.text: Great brace for the price. These are the exact same braces that lots of orthopedic doctors prescribe for their patients from in their offices and then bill you $850 dollars for. They're not top of the technology field but you can't beat me for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tina James

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BRACE
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to ski in and it created the support I needed and was comfortable. I would buy this brand again. Actually, I have, this is my second brace from McDavid.
customer_reviews.author: MARK EDGECOMB

customer_reviews.title: Good construction and if it fit me would probably have ...
customer_reviews.text: Wound up sending back for a larger size and then that was still to small.. Good construction and if it fit me would probably have kept it
customer_reviews.author: Aurorian

customer_reviews.title: This is a great brace. My son had some keen pain and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brace. My son had some keen pain and swelling that we knew was not tendon related. It was a great support for practice as he rehabbed the injury. The metal hinges are removable for added movement (and competition) if desired.
customer_reviews.author: KenB

customer_reviews.title: Knee brace
customer_reviews.text: It fit a little tight but worked good for my swelling knee.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: 25+ years of steelies on concrete with bad left knees in my family & all I can ...
customer_reviews.text: 25+ years of steelies on concrete with bad left knees in my family & all I can say is....ahhhh! Shoulda done it years earlier!
customer_reviews.author: john roush

customer_reviews.title: Allows me to play tennis longer
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my knee stable. Reduces my knee pain while playing tennis. I believe it will give me extra level of protection from further knee injury.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny L.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had ordered the 1X
customer_reviews.text: It's too big for me.....I think the 1X would have been a perfect fit but I ordered a 2X instead because of the measurements I got but it's ok I can adjusted it
customer_reviews.author: Alison C.

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I liked that they are easy to put on. Doesn't pinch the back of my knees. I have tried a number of braces and have finally found one that stands up to what is describe in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great lateral stability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my husband hurt his knee. He really liked the lateral stability. It was comfortable to wear, he felt very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M Hall

customer_reviews.title: good construction
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, but not what I need to strengthen legs, good construction
customer_reviews.author: Silverrose

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: Using it for a sprained MCL. Can feel it working although it won't completely keep knee aligned under heavy torque. Was tight to begin with but fits well now. Velcro stays in place. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: J Bob Shu

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Same thing as what the surgical supply ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product .Same thing as what the surgical supply had that they said if mcr didn't pay it would cast us $400.
customer_reviews.author: DOTTIE

customer_reviews.title: Seems solid
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Large is tad loose on my calf and thigh but straps snug it up fine. Works good for hockey practice.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID P.

customer_reviews.title: The doctor told her to wear a brace and said that one was perfect until she gets her MRI
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter said it really help with her walking around.. she doesn't take it off during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Palmer

product_meta.title: McDavid 429X Knee Brace, Maximum Knee Support & Compression for Knee Stability,
product_meta.description: 100% latex-free 4.8mm neoprene (CR). Bi-lateral polycentric hinges for knee stability. Elastic crossing straps.
feature_bullets: This Knee Brace provides high level support to improve knee stability, help reduce knee injury and assist in recovery
COMPRESSION Elastic crossing straps for enhanced rotational and collateral ligament support
SUPPORTIVE- Geared side hinges add stability and free movement
ADJUSTABLE top and bottom straps assure a personalized fit
LATEX-FREE neoprene provides thermal compression to keep your muscles warm and prevents injuries
PATELLA SUPPORT- Open 360˚ padded buttress isolates and supports the Knee patella
COMFORTABLE bound edges prevents irritation to your skin
KEEP COOL & DRY- Perforated back panel provides heat and moisture management and all-around comfort
This Ankle brace is intended to fit snug for the best support. Although, if your measurements are close to the maximum size range, we recommend to size up for comfort.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
